text: You cannot if your developer didnt code it into the template. If your template is fixed, you cant. If its drag and drop and this module is in the DnD area, then you can by that blue button at the top of the module when you hover over it.
Normally this is done by hiding module rather than deleting it, but again this is something your developer needs to code into the template.
Try the "Design" tag at the top, there are often hidden flexibility elements like "hide module".
The last resort is to keep module empty and it will either go away completaly, or it will just make a space, depending how your developer made it appear in the first place.
